title: In-memory Engine: sysbench oltp_read_write fails with "assertion failed"
body:

```log
FATAL: mysql_stmt_execute() returned error 8141 (assertion failed: key: 74800000000000006b5f69800000000000000103800000000601a076038000000005f2dc36, assertion: Exist, start_ts: 451004559148712779, existing start ts: 451004087433691943, existing commit ts: 451004087446799677) for query 'DELETE FROM sbtest1 WHERE id=?'
FATAL: `thread_run' function failed: /usr/share/sysbench/oltp_common.lua:497: SQL error, errno = 8141, state = 'HY000': assertion failed: key: 74800000000000006b5f69800000000000000103800000000601a076038000000005f2dc36, assertion: Exist, start_ts: 451004559148712779, existing start ts: 451004087433691943, existing commit ts: 451004087446799677
```


### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

v8.1.0-20240621-c57aef1 https://github.com/tikv/tikv/tree/v8.1.0-20240621-c57aef1

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

```bash
[mysql] > alter table test.sbtest1 ATTRIBUTES "cache=always";

sysbench \
  --db-driver=mysql \
  --mysql-host=$HOST \
  --mysql-port=$PORT \
  --mysql-user=root \
  --mysql-db=sbtest1 \
  --tables=1 \
  --table-size=200000000 \
  --threads=100 \
  --time=36000000 \
  --report-interval=3 \
  --skip-trx=true \
  --mysql-ignore-errors=1062,2013,8028,9007 \
  --auto-inc=false \
  --rand-type=special oltp_read_write run
```

### What did you expect?

No assertion failed.

### What did happened?

assertion failed.
